method.doc: The HTTP Redirect Authentication mechanism must be correctly configured before the policy workflow can successfully respond to any runtime requests. Information about its configuration is available under the Configuring Authentication topics of the IBM Knowledge Center.

Once a valid authentication state context has been established for a policy that includes the HTTP Redirect authentication mechanism, and that mechanism is current for the active state, then the requester may authenticate using a HTTP redirect from a 3rd party server.
